Petrified

Source: XPHB, page 372

While you have the Petrified condition, you experience the following effects. You are transformed, along with any nonmagical objects you are wearing and carrying, into a solid inanimate substance (usually stone). Your weight increases by a factor of ten, and you cease aging.You have the Incapacitated|XPHB condition.Your Speed|XPHB is 0 and can't increase.Attack|XPHB rolls against you have Advantage|XPHB.You automatically fail Strength and Dexterity Saving Throw|XPHB|saving throws.You have Resistance|XPHB to all damage.You have Immunity|XPHB to the Poisoned|XPHB condition.

_srdData.name: Petrified
entries: While you have the Petrified condition, you experience the following effects.

entries.name: Turned to Inanimate Substance
entries: You are transformed, along with any nonmagical objects you are wearing and carrying, into a solid inanimate substance (usually stone). Your weight increases by a factor of ten, and you cease aging.

entries.name: Speed 0
entries: Your {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} is 0 and can't increase.

entries.name: Attacks Affected
entries: {@action Attack|XPHB} rolls against you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB}.

entries.name: Saving Throws Affected
entries: You automatically fail Strength and Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB|saving throws}.

entries.name: Resist Damage
entries: You have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to all damage.

entries.name: Poison Immunity
entries: You have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition.
